description:
Customise your character and your home with the Gold Throne Pack which includes:

- Gold Crystal Shard Throne
- Gold Pioneer flag
- Welders Mask
- Red Neon Block Type
- Yellow Neon Block Type
- Gold cat
- Rainbow World Island

The world of Elysia needs YOU! Join this cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG to level up your character, craft epic weapons, conquer enemies in real-time, and build almost anything! Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!
name: Portal Knights - Gold Throne Pack
